question.title: [Metaculus] Will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democra...nomination for President?
question.body:
Will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President?

Resolves the same as the original on Metaculus.

(https://www.metaculus.com/questions/question_embed/25755/?theme=dark)Resolution criteria

This question will resolve as Yes if prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign makes a definitive, public, official announcement to the effect that Joe Biden will not seek and will not accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 cycle.

To qualify for a Yes resolution, the statement must be unambiguous and conclusive: it should leave no room for the possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle.

If such a definitive statement is not made prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, this question will resolve as No.

Fine print and additional background information can be found on Metaculus.

Once the original resolves, its resolution will be applied to this market automatically. Trustworthy-ish users are encouraged to resolve this market before then if the outcome is known and unambiguous. Feel free to ping @jskf to request early resolution or to report issues.

Q.title: Will Joe Biden publicly endorse another candidate for the Democratic nomination before July 15, 2024?
Q.body: This question will resolve as Yes if prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign makes a definitive, public, official announcement endorsing another candidate for the Democratic Party's nomination for President in the 2024 cycle.

P_given_Q.title: Given Joe Biden publicly endorses another candidate for the Democratic nomination before July 15, 2024, will he announce that he will not accept the Democratic nomination for President?
P_given_Q.body:
This question will resolve as Yes if prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign makes a definitive, public, official announcement endorsing another candidate for the Democratic Party's nomination for President in the 2024 cycle. 

Additionally, will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President? 

This question will resolve as Yes if prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign makes a definitive, public, official announcement to the effect that Joe Biden will not seek and will not accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 cycle. 

To qualify for a Yes resolution, the statement must be unambiguous and conclusive, leaving no room for the possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle. 

If such a definitive statement is not made prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, this question will resolve as No.

P_given_not_Q.title: Given Joe Biden does not publicly endorse another candidate for the Democratic nomination before July 15, 2024, will he announce that he will not accept the Democratic nomination for President?
P_given_not_Q.body:
This question considers the situation where Joe Biden does not publicly endorse another candidate for the Democratic Party's nomination for President before 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024. 

If this is true, will he then make a definitive, public, official announcement before the same deadline that he will not seek and will not accept the nomination of his party for another term as President in the 2024 cycle? 

Resolution criteria: 
1. For the first condition (P) to be true, Joe Biden or his campaign must not make a definitive, public, official announcement endorsing another candidate for the Democratic Party's nomination for President before 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024. 
2. For the outcome (Q) to be true, Joe Biden or his campaign must make a definitive, public, official announcement stating that he will not seek and will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President before 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024.

Q.body: Will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024, that he endorses another candidate for the Democratic Party's nomination for President?

P_given_Q.title: Given that Joe Biden announces his endorsement for another Democratic candidate before July 15, 2024, will he also announce that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President?

The statement must be unambiguous and conclusive, leaving no room for the possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle. If such a definitive statement is not made prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, this question will resolve as No.

question.title: If Joe Biden announces he will not accept the Democratic nomination, will Kamala Harris's odds of winning increase according to Nate Silver's model?
question.body:
Suppose the following is true: Joe Biden announces before July 15, 2024, that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President. This announcement must be definitive, unambiguous, and made publicly by Biden or his campaign, leaving no possibility of him accepting the nomination for the 2024 election.

Given this, will Kamala Harris's Electoral College probability in Nate Silver's model be greater than 46.6% on Friday, August 9th, at 8:40 PM? Resolves YES if it is >46.6% at that time, and NO otherwise.

This analysis considers the impact of Biden's decision on Harris's perceived chances in the model, as tracked on Nate Silver's platform.

Q.title: Will another prominent Democratic candidate enter the race if Joe Biden announces he will not accept the nomination?
Q.body: This question will resolve as Yes if a significant Democratic candidate (defined as someone who has previously held office or has substantial public recognition) announces their candidacy after Joe Biden's announcement but before the Democratic National Convention in 2024.

P_given_Q.title: Given that another prominent Democratic candidate enters the race if Joe Biden announces he will not accept the nomination, will Kamala Harris's odds of winning increase according to Nate Silver's model?
P_given_Q.body:
This question will resolve as Yes if a significant Democratic candidate (defined as someone who has previously held office or has substantial public recognition) announces their candidacy after Joe Biden's announcement but before the Democratic National Convention in 2024.

Suppose the following is true: Joe Biden announces before July 15, 2024, that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President. This announcement must be definitive, unambiguous, and made publicly by Biden or his campaign, leaving no possibility of him accepting the nomination for the 2024 election.

Given this, will Kamala Harris's Electoral College probability in Nate Silver's model be greater than 46.6% on Friday, August 9th, at 8:40 PM? Resolves YES if it is >46.6% at that time, and NO otherwise.

This analysis considers the impact of Biden's decision on Harris's perceived chances in the model, as tracked on Nate Silver's platform.

P_given_not_Q.title: Given Joe Biden announces he will not accept the Democratic nomination, will no prominent Democratic candidate enter the race and will Kamala Harris's odds of winning increase according to Nate Silver's model?
P_given_not_Q.body:
Suppose the following is true: Joe Biden announces before July 15, 2024, that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President. This announcement must be definitive, unambiguous, and made publicly by Biden or his campaign, leaving no possibility of him accepting the nomination for the 2024 election.

This leads to two conditions: 1) Will no significant Democratic candidate (defined as someone who has previously held office or has substantial public recognition) announce their candidacy after Joe Biden's announcement but before the Democratic National Convention in 2024? Resolves YES if no significant candidate enters the race. 2) Given this announcement, will Kamala Harris's Electoral College probability in Nate Silver's model be greater than 46.6% on Friday, August 9th, at 8:40 PM? Resolves YES if it is >46.6% at that time, and NO otherwise.

If the condition regarding Biden's announcement is not met, resolves N/A.

Q.title: Will Kamala Harris's odds of winning the Democratic nomination increase if Joe Biden announces he will not run by June 2024?
Q.body: This question will resolve as Yes if Kamala Harris's odds of winning the Democratic nomination increase according to Nate Silver's model after Joe Biden's announcement before June 2024. It will resolve as No if her odds do not increase after the announcement.

P_given_Q.title: Given Kamala Harris's odds of winning the Democratic nomination increase if Joe Biden announces he will not run by June 2024, will her odds increase according to Nate Silver's model if Joe Biden announces he will not accept the Democratic nomination?
P_given_Q.body:
Suppose the following is true: Joe Biden announces before July 15, 2024, that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President. This announcement must be definitive, unambiguous, and made publicly by Biden or his campaign, leaving no possibility of him accepting the nomination for the 2024 election.

If Kamala Harris's odds of winning the Democratic nomination increase according to Nate Silver's model after Joe Biden's announcement before June 2024, then given Biden's announcement, will Kamala Harris's Electoral College probability in Nate Silver's model be greater than 46.6% on Friday, August 9th, at 8:40 PM? Resolves YES if it is >46.6% at that time, and NO otherwise.

P_given_not_Q.title: Given Kamala Harris's odds not increasing if Biden does not run, will her odds increase if he announces he will not accept the nomination?
P_given_not_Q.body:
Suppose the following is true: Kamala Harris's odds of winning the Democratic nomination do not increase according to Nate Silver's model after Joe Biden's announcement before June 2024 that he will not run. This question will resolve as Yes if Kamala Harris's odds of winning the Democratic nomination do not increase according to Nate Silver's model after Joe Biden's announcement before June 2024. It will resolve as No if her odds increase after the announcement.

Now, suppose also that Joe Biden announces before July 15, 2024, that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President. This announcement must be definitive, unambiguous, and made publicly by Biden or his campaign, leaving no possibility of him accepting the nomination for the 2024 election.

Given this, will Kamala Harris's Electoral College probability in Nate Silver's model be greater than 46.6% on Friday, August 9th, at 8:40 PM? Resolves YES if it is >46.6% at that time, and NO otherwise.

Q.title: Will Kamala Harris secure the Democratic nomination if Biden does not run?
Q.body: This question will resolve as Yes if Kamala Harris is the official Democratic nominee for President following Joe Biden's announcement not to seek the nomination, and No if another candidate secures the nomination instead.

P_given_Q.title: Given Kamala Harris secures the Democratic nomination if Biden does not run, will her odds of winning increase according to Nate Silver's model?
P_given_Q.body:
Suppose the following is true: Kamala Harris is the official Democratic nominee for President following Joe Biden's announcement not to seek the nomination. This announcement must be definitive, unambiguous, and made publicly by Biden or his campaign, leaving no possibility of him accepting the nomination for the 2024 election.

Given this, will Kamala Harris's Electoral College probability in Nate Silver's model be greater than 46.6% on Friday, August 9th, at 8:40 PM? Resolves YES if it is >46.6% at that time, and NO otherwise.

This analysis considers the impact of Biden's decision on Harris's perceived chances in the model, as tracked on Nate Silver's platform.

P_given_not_Q.title: Given Kamala Harris does not secure the Democratic nomination if Biden does not run, will her odds of winning increase according to Nate Silver's model if Biden announces he will not accept the Democratic nomination?
P_given_not_Q.body:
This question considers the scenario where Kamala Harris is not the official Democratic nominee for President following Joe Biden's announcement not to seek the nomination. This question will resolve as Yes if Kamala Harris is not the official Democratic nominee for President following Joe Biden's announcement not to seek the nomination, and No if she is the nominee instead. 

Suppose the following is true: Joe Biden announces before July 15, 2024, that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President. This announcement must be definitive, unambiguous, and made publicly by Biden or his campaign, leaving no possibility of him accepting the nomination for the 2024 election. 

Given this, will Kamala Harris's Electoral College probability in Nate Silver's model be greater than 46.6% on Friday, August 9th, at 8:40 PM? Resolves YES if it is >46.6% at that time, and NO otherwise.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) Will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President? (b) Will Kamala's odds of winning increase over the next week according to Nate Silver's model?
question.body:
(a) Will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President? This resolves as Yes if prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign makes a definitive, public, official announcement that he will not seek and will not accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 cycle. The statement must be unambiguous and conclusive, leaving no room for the possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President in the 2024 election cycle. If such a definitive statement is not made prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, this question will resolve as No.

(b) Will Kamala's odds of winning increase over the next week according to Nate Silver's model? Resolves YES if the Electoral College probability for Harris in Nate Silver's model is >46.6% on Friday August 9th at 8:40 PM. Resolves NO otherwise. Link: https://www.natesilver.net/p/nate-silver-2024-president-election-polls-model

Q.title: Will other prominent Democrats announce their candidacy for the 2024 Presidential election by July 15, 2024?
Q.body: This question will resolve as Yes if, prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, any prominent Democratic politician officially announces their candidacy for the 2024 Presidential election. If no such announcements are made by that date, this question will resolve as No.

(b) Will Kamala's odds of winning increase over the next week according to Nate Silver's model?

This question will resolve as Yes if, prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, any prominent Democratic politician officially announces their candidacy for the 2024 Presidential election. If no such announcements are made by that date, this question will resolve as No.

(a) Will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President? If such a definitive statement is not made prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, this question will resolve as No.

(b) Will Kamala's odds of winning increase over the next week according to Nate Silver's model? Resolves YES if the Electoral College probability for Harris in Nate Silver's model is >46.6% on Friday August 9th at 8:40 PM. Resolves NO otherwise.

Q.title: Will another prominent Democratic figure announce their candidacy for President before July 15, 2024?
Q.body: This question will resolve as Yes if, prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, a major Democratic Party figure officially announces their intention to run for the 2024 Presidential election. If no such announcement is made, this question will resolve as No.

Q.title: Will Joe Biden publicly endorse Kamala Harris as his successor before July 15, 2024?
Q.body: This question will resolve as Yes if Joe Biden makes a definitive, public, official endorsement of Kamala Harris as his preferred successor for the Democratic Party's nomination for President in the 2024 cycle before 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024. If such an endorsement is not made prior to that date, this question will resolve as No.

P_given_Q.title: Given Joe Biden's endorsement of Kamala Harris, will both of the following occur: (a) Joe Biden will announce before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President, and (b) Kamala's odds of winning will increase over the next week according to Nate Silver's model?
P_given_Q.body: Suppose the following is true: Joe Biden makes a definitive, public, official endorsement of Kamala Harris as his preferred successor for the Democratic Party's nomination for President in the 2024 cycle before 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024. Then will both of the following occur: (a) Will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President? This resolves as Yes if prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign makes a definitive, public, official announcement that he will not seek and will not accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 cycle. The statement must be unambiguous and conclusive, leaving no room for the possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President in the 2024 election cycle. If such a definitive statement is not made prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, this question will resolve as No. (b) Will Kamala's odds of winning increase over the next week according to Nate Silver's model? Resolves YES if the Electoral College probability for Harris in Nate Silver's model is >46.6% on Friday August 9th at 8:40 PM. Resolves NO otherwise.

P_given_not_Q.title: Given that Joe Biden does not publicly endorse Kamala Harris as his successor before July 15, 2024, will both of the following occur: (a) Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President? and (b) Kamala's odds of winning increase over the next week according to Nate Silver's model?
P_given_not_Q.body: This question will resolve as Yes if both of the following conditions are met: (a) Joe Biden or his campaign makes a definitive, public, official announcement before 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, that he will not seek and will not accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 cycle, and the statement is unambiguous and conclusive; and (b) the Electoral College probability for Kamala Harris in Nate Silver's model is greater than 46.6% on Friday, August 9th at 8:40 PM. If either condition is not met, this question will resolve as No.
